arn.description: The ARN of the Amazon SQS queue specified as the target for the dead-letter queue.

description.description: A description of the pipe. At most 512 characters.

desiredState.description: The state the pipe should be in. One of: `RUNNING`, `STOPPED`.

enrichment.description: Enrichment resource of the pipe (typically an ARN). Read more about enrichment in the [User Guide](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/eventbridge/latest/userguide/eb-pipes.html#pipes-enrichment).

enrichmentParameters.description: Parameters to configure enrichment for your pipe. Detailed below.

name.description: Name of the pipe. If omitted, the provider will assign a random, unique name. Conflicts with `name_prefix`.

namePrefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified prefix. Conflicts with `name`.

roleArn.description: ARN of the role that allows the pipe to send data to the target.

source.description: Source resource of the pipe (typically an ARN).

sourceParameters.description: Parameters to configure a source for the pipe. Detailed below.

tags.description: Key-value mapping of resource tags. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: Map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

target.description:
Target resource of the pipe (typically an ARN).

The following arguments are optional:

targetParameters.description: Parameters to configure a target for your pipe. Detailed below.
